Subset_Questions.name: Question Template for Subsets
Subset_Questions.Q0: What is the ID of the Subset?
Subset_Questions.Q1: What is the name of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Q2: When was the subset last updated?
Subset_Questions.Q3: What is the modality of the subset? (The type of data)
Subset_Questions.Q4: What is the format or the schema of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Q5: What is the size of the subset? (Number of rows if it's a table or files if it's a directory)
Subset_Questions.Q6: What is the ID of the parent of the subset? (Use 0 if none)
Subset_Questions.Q7: What is the purpose of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Q8: What is the link (URL) to further description of the subset?

Feature_Questions.name: Question Template for Features
Feature_Questions.Q0: What is the ID of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q1: What is the ID of the reference subset of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q2: What is the introduction date of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q3: What is the name of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q4: What are the values that the feature might take?
Feature_Questions.Q5: What special meaning does NA, NULL, NONE, or any other placeholder have with respect to this feature?
Feature_Questions.Q6: What is the meaning of the feature if it is zero?
Feature_Questions.Q7: What does it mean if no value is to be found?
Feature_Questions.Q8: What level of non-zero sparsity is there?
Feature_Questions.Q9: What is the mean if the feature is nummeric?
Feature_Questions.Q10: What is the standard deviation if the feature is numeric?
Feature_Questions.Q11: How many modes does the feature have?
Feature_Questions.Q13: What is the inter quartile range?
Feature_Questions.Q14: What is the ID of the parent feature (If derived from other features)
Feature_Questions.Q15: What unit is this feature in?
Feature_Questions.Q17: Why does the feature exist or is it superfluous?
Feature_Questions.Q18: State whether the feature is encoded and what the mapping is.

Subset_1.name: Subset 1
Subset_1.A7: NOPHO ALL-92, patient cohort with background information. Follow-up until 20.04.04

Feature_3.name: Feature 3
Feature_3.A16: Number of days until censtoring from start of maintainence therapy

Feature_6.name: Feature 6
Feature_6.A16: Treatment risk group, SR= stnadard risk, IR = intermediate risk, HR = high risk
Feature_6.A17: Treatment risk group, SR= stnadard risk, IR = intermediate risk, HR = high risk

Feature_7.name: Feature 7
Feature_7.A16: Time to relapse from start of maintenance therapy

Feature_10.name: Feature 10
Feature_10.A16: Age of patient at diagnosis of leukemia.

Subset_2.name: Subset 2
Subset_2.A7: NOPHO ALL-92, blood samples, one row per sample per patient to determine EMTX and E6TGN levels

Subset_3.name: Subset 3
Subset_3.A7: NOPHO ALL-92, one line per patient reporting medicine, medicine dose or blood sample to determine leukocyte count

Subset_4.name: Subset 4
Subset_4.A7: NOPHO ALL-92, Contains a line for each patient with various averages and patient-specific information. The majority of the averages are taken from the course file and how they are determined therefore appears from the description of the course file.

Subset_5.name: Subset 5
Subset_5.A7: NOPHO ALL-2008, patient cohort with background information.

Feature_32.name: Feature 32
Feature_32.A17: Used to define the sex of a person, often used to tsratify patients or as a covariate in analysis.

Feature_33.name: Feature 33
Feature_33.A17: Used for longitudinal analysis of data

Feature_34.name: Feature 34
Feature_34.A16: Age of patient at diagnosis of leukemia.
Feature_34.A17: Often used in analysis as many biological features can be influenced by age.

Feature_35.name: Feature 35
Feature_35.A4: 1: B-precursor ALL, 2: T-cell ALL, 3: Bilineage ALL = excl. from SR and Rand., 4: mature B-cell ALL, 9: Missing data
Feature_35.A16: Immunophenotype/Cell lineage of acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)
Feature_35.A17: Used to stratify patients as the different subtypes have much biological variation.

Feature_36.name: Feature 36
Feature_36.A16: Highest measure of white blood cells in peripheral blood. Measured before any treatment/at diagnosis of ALL.
Feature_36.A17: Used as a stratification measure in the first treatment stratification. Measure of tumor burden in leukemia.

Feature_37.name: Feature 37
Feature_37.A16: Decides if a patient has been excluded for any clinical or non-clinical reason.
Feature_37.A17: Patients can be excluded from the protocol, and potentially also from analysis.

Feature_38.name: Feature 38
Feature_38.A4: 0: no reasons for exclusion, 1: clinical decision to exclude patient for other reason
Feature_38.A16: Gives the reason for exclusion as either clinical or not
Feature_38.A17: Can be used to determine if excluded patients should still be in analysis.

Feature_39.name: Feature 39
Feature_39.A4: 0: Insufficient data, 1 & 2: NOPHO-2008 Non-HighRisk, 3: NOPHO-2008 High Risk, 9: Excluded
Feature_39.A16: Defines the stratification group applied at diagnosis (day 0), which decides the intensity of leukemia treatement.
Feature_39.A17: Based on clinical measures of stratification and can give information on the initial treatment intensity.

Feature_40.name: Feature 40
Feature_40.A4: 1: NOPHO-2008 induction therapy with Prednisolone only, 2: NOPHO-2008 induction therapy with Dexa. +/- pred-prephase, 3: Other induction therapy
Feature_40.A16: Defines the type of induction therapy administered.

Feature_41.name: Feature 41
Feature_41.A4: 0: Insufficient data, 1 & 2: NOPHO-2008 Non-HighRisk, 3: NOPHO-2008 High Risk, 9: Excluded
Feature_41.A16: Defines the stratification group applied after genetic analysis.
Feature_41.A17: Based on clinical measures of stratification and can give information on the initial treatment intensity.

Feature_42.name: Feature 42
Feature_42.A4: 0: Insufficient data, 1 & 2: NOPHO-2008 Non-HighRisk, 3: NOPHO-2008 High Risk, but had standard risk induction therapy, 4: NOPHO-2008 High Risk blocksDirect, 9: Excluded
Feature_42.A16: Defines the stratification group at day 15 after early response therapy.
Feature_42.A17: Based on clinical measures of stratification and can give information on the continued treatment intensity.

Feature_43.name: Feature 43
Feature_43.A4: 1: NOPHO-2008 Standard/Intermediate risk (continue induction therapy Pred), 2: NOPHO-2008 High Risk (continue induction therapy Dexa), 3: NOPHO-2008 High risk (block therapy), 9: Other therapy used.
Feature_43.A16: Defines the type of therapy administered after the stratification at day 15.

Feature_44.name: Feature 44
Feature_44.A16: Comment on the therapy applied from day 15.

Feature_45.name: Feature 45
Feature_45.A6: Too early to see remission response
Feature_45.A16: Defines if a remission response is seen.
Feature_45.A17: Helps define the individual patient response to treatment.

Feature_46.name: Feature 46
Feature_46.A4: 0: Insufficient data, 1: NOPHO-2008 Standard Risk, 2: NOPHO-2008 Intermediate Risk, 5: NOPHO-2008 High Risk chemo, 6: NOPHO-2008 High Risk stem cell transplant (SCT) in first complete remission (CR1), 9: Excluded
Feature_46.A16: Defines the risk stratificiation after intermediate response on day 29.
Feature_46.A17: Determines the continued treatment intensity at day 29 and current risk of treatment failure or relapse.

Feature_47.name: Feature 47
Feature_47.A4: 1: NOPHO-2008 Standard risk, 2: NOPHO-2008 Intermediate risk, 3: NOPHO-2008 High risk chemo, 4: NOPHO-2008 High risk stem cell transplant (SCT) in first complete remission (CR1), 5: Other therapy administered.
Feature_47.A16: Defines the therapy type administered from day 29

Feature_48.name: Feature 48
Feature_48.A16: Comment on the therapy applied from day 29.

Feature_49.name: Feature 49
Feature_49.A4: 0: Insufficient data, 1: NOPHO-2008 Standard Risk, 2: NOPHO-2008 Intermediate Risk, 5: NOPHO-2008 High Risk chemo, 6: NOPHO-2008 High Risk stem cell transplant (SCT) in first complete remission (CR1), 7: Event, 9: Excluded
Feature_49.A16: Defines the final risk stratificiation at day 79
Feature_49.A17: Determines the final treatment intensity at day 79 and current risk of treatment failure or relapse.

Feature_50.name: Feature 50
Feature_50.A4: 1: NOPHO-2008 Standard risk, 2: NOPHO-2008 Intermediate risk, 3: NOPHO-2008 High risk chemo, 4: NOPHO-2008 High risk stem cell transplant (SCT) in first complete remission (CR1), 5: Other therapy administered.
Feature_50.A16: Defines the therapy type administered after the final treatment stratification from day 79.

Feature_51.name: Feature 51
Feature_51.A16: Comment on the therapy applied from day 79.

Feature_52.name: Feature 52
Feature_52.A4: 0: first complete remission (CR1), 1: induction failure, 2: resistant disease, 3: relapse, 4: death in first complete remission (DCR1), 5: development of second malignant neoplasms (SMN)
Feature_52.A17: The events tell about how the treatement and disease progress.

Feature_53.name: Feature 53
Feature_53.A16: Defines if a patient died following continued complete remission (was alive during first complete remission (CR1)).

Subset_6.name: Subset 6
Subset_6.A7: NOPHO ALL-08, blood samples, one row per sample per patient to determine metabolite levels incl. Methylated metabolites

Feature_55.name: Feature 55
Feature_55.A16: Number of days bloodsample taken since diagnosis
Feature_55.A17: Number of days bloodsample taken since diagnosis

Feature_56.name: Feature 56
Feature_56.A16: thioguanine nucleotides; -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value
Feature_56.A17: thioguanine nucleotides; -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value

Feature_57.name: Feature 57
Feature_57.A16: DNA-incorporated thioguanine ; -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value
Feature_57.A17: DNA-incorporated thioguanine ; -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value

Feature_59.name: Feature 59
Feature_59.A16: enzyme thiopurine S-methyl transferase; -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value
Feature_59.A17: enzyme thiopurine S-methyl transferase; -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value

Feature_62.name: Feature 62
Feature_62.A16: methotrexate; -9 means detectable value, -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value
Feature_62.A17: methotrexate; -9 means detectable value, -1 = least standard, 0 = regular value

Subset_7.name: Subset 7
Subset_7.A7: NOPHO ALL-2008. Genome-wide SNP profiling. 2146021 variants and 1829 people pass filters and QC.
